premise_source_doc_sentence: Irwin Allen Ginsberg  (  -LSB- ˈɡɪnzbərɡ -RSB- June 3 , 1926 -- April 5 , 1997  )  was an American poet of Jewish origin , and one of the leading figures of both the Beat Generation of the 1950s and the counterculture that soon would follow .

claim: Allen Ginsberg advocated for the persecution of the powerless.
